token: Optional - an OAuth2 token from Crittercism - if not provided, the collector scripts will fetch and store

endpoints.appId: App ID for monitored endpoint, ex: 519d53101386202089000007
endpoints.domain: The host part of the endpoint, ex: graph.facebook.com
endpoints.endpoint: The path part of the endpoint, ex: /critter.crittercism/picture

endpoints.appId: Put an entry in the endpoints array for each endpoint you want to monitor

endpoints-auto.appId: automatically monitor the top <limit> endpoints (by volume)

services.appId: App ID for monitored service, ex: 519d53101386202089000007
services.service: The name of the monitored service as seen in Crittercism UI, ex: urbanairship

services.domain: Another way to specify a service to monitor is by domain, ex: graph.facebook.com

services-auto.appId: automatically monitor the top <limit> endpoints (by volume)

transactions.appId: Specify an App ID to monitor transactions in that app, ex: 519d53101386202089000007
